verses.verse: Hear <S%H8085><s%> this <S%H2088><s%> word, <S%H1697><s%> you cows <S%H6510><s%> of Bashan, <S%H1316><s%> that are in the mountain <S%H2022><s%> of Samaria, <S%H8111><s%> which oppress <S%H6231><s%> the poor, <S%H1800><s%> which crush <S%H7533><s%> the needy, <S%H34><s%> which say <S%H559><s%> to their masters, <S%H113><s%> Bring, <S%H935><s%> and let us drink. <S%H8354><s%>

The Lord <S%H136><s%> GOD <S%H3069><s%> has sworn <S%H7650><s%> by his holiness, <S%H6944><s%> that, see, <S%H2009><s%> the days <S%H3117><s%> shall come <S%H935><s%> on you, that he will take <S%H5375><s%> you away with hooks, <S%H6793><s%> and your posterity <S%H319><s%> with fishhooks <S%H5518><s%> <S%H1729><s%>.

And you shall go <S%H3318><s%> out at the breaches, <S%H6556><s%> every <S%H802><s%> cow at that which is before <S%H5048><s%> her; and you shall cast <S%H7993><s%> them into the palace, <S%H2038><s%> said <S%H5001><s%> the LORD. <S%H3068><s%>

Come <S%H935><s%> to Bethel, <S%H1008><s%> and transgress; <S%H6586><s%> at Gilgal <S%H1537><s%> multiply <S%H7235><s%> transgression; <S%H6586><s%> and bring <S%H935><s%> your sacrifices <S%H2077><s%> every morning, <S%H1242><s%> and your tithes <S%H4643><s%> after three <S%H7969><s%> years: <S%H3117><s%>

And offer <S%H6999><s%> a sacrifice of thanksgiving <S%H8426><s%> with leaven, <S%H2557><s%> and proclaim <S%H7121><s%> and publish <S%H8085><s%> the free <S%H5071><s%> offerings: for this <S%H3651><s%> likes <S%H157><s%> you, O you children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> said <S%H5001><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> GOD. <S%H3069><s%>

And I also <S%H1571><s%> have given <S%H5414><s%> you cleanness <S%H5356><s%> of teeth <S%H8127><s%> in all <S%H3605><s%> your cities, <S%H5892><s%> and want <S%H2640><s%> of bread <S%H3899><s%> in all <S%H3605><s%> your places: <S%H4725><s%> yet have you not returned <S%H7725><s%> to me, said <S%H5001><s%> the LORD. <S%H3068><s%>

And also <S%H1571><s%> I have withheld <S%H4513><s%> the rain <S%H1653><s%> from you, when there were yet <S%H5750><s%> three <S%H7969><s%> months <S%H2320><s%> to the harvest: <S%H7105><s%> and I caused it to rain <S%H4305><s%> on one <S%H259><s%> city, <S%H5892><s%> and caused it not to rain <S%H4305><s%> on another <S%H259><s%> city: <S%H5892><s%> one <S%H259><s%> piece was rained <S%H4305><s%> on, and the piece whereupon <S%H834><s%> <S%H5921><s%> it rained <S%H4305><s%> not withered. <S%H3001><s%>

So two <S%H8147><s%> or three <S%H7969><s%> cities <S%H5892><s%> wandered <S%H5128><s%> to one <S%H259><s%> city, <S%H5892><s%> to drink <S%H8354><s%> water; <S%H4325><s%> but they were not satisfied: <S%H7646><s%> yet have you not returned <S%H7725><s%> to me, said <S%H5001><s%> the LORD. <S%H3068><s%>

I have smitten <S%H5221><s%> you with blasting <S%H7711><s%> and mildew: <S%H3420><s%> when your gardens <S%H1593><s%> and your vineyards <S%H3754><s%> and your fig <S%H8384><s%> trees and your olive <S%H2132><s%> trees increased, <S%H7235><s%> the palmerworm <S%H1501><s%> devoured <S%H398><s%> them: yet have you not returned <S%H7725><s%> to me, said <S%H5001><s%> the LORD. <S%H3068><s%>

I have sent <S%H7971><s%> among you the pestilence <S%H1698><s%> after the manner <S%H1870><s%> of Egypt: <S%H4714><s%> your young <S%H970><s%> men have I slain <S%H2026><s%> with the sword, <S%H2719><s%> and have taken <S%H7628><s%> away <S%H7628><s%> your horses; <S%H5483><s%> and I have made the stink <S%H889><s%> of your camps <S%H4264><s%> to come <S%H5927><s%> up to your nostrils: <S%H639><s%> yet have you not returned <S%H7725><s%> to me, said <S%H5001><s%> the LORD. <S%H3068><s%>

I have overthrown <S%H2015><s%> some of you, as God <S%H430><s%> overthrew <S%H4114><s%> Sodom <S%H5467><s%> and Gomorrah, <S%H6017><s%> and you were as a firebrand <S%H181><s%> plucked <S%H5337><s%> out of the burning: <S%H8316><s%> yet have you not returned <S%H7725><s%> to me, said <S%H5001><s%> the LORD. <S%H3068><s%>

Therefore <S%H3651><s%> thus <S%H3541><s%> will I do <S%H6213><s%> to you, O Israel: <S%H3478><s%> and because <S%H6118><s%> <S%H3588><s%> I will do <S%H6213><s%> this <S%H2063><s%> to you, prepare <S%H3559><s%> to meet <S%H7125><s%> your God, <S%H430><s%> O Israel. <S%H3478><s%>

For, see, <S%H2009><s%> he that forms <S%H3335><s%> the mountains, <S%H2022><s%> and creates <S%H1254><s%> the wind, <S%H7307><s%> and declares <S%H5046><s%> to man <S%H120><s%> what <S%H4100><s%> is his thought, <S%H7808><s%> that makes <S%H6213><s%> the morning <S%H7837><s%> darkness, <S%H5890><s%> and treads <S%H1869><s%> on the high <S%H1116><s%> places of the earth, <S%H776><s%> The LORD, <S%H3068><s%> The God <S%H430><s%> of hosts, <S%H6635><s%> is his name. <S%H8034><s%>
